embeds.title: ğŸš€ Jarvi Beta â€” v0.1.2 is LIVE!
embeds.description:
Apologies for the late launch â€” we know we promised a 10 June release ğŸ™
But... the website took over and stole our sleep ğŸ˜ª

Anyway, **Jarvi is finally LIVE**, and wayyy better than before <a:Hurre:1395491574171046109>

ğŸ› ï¸ **Whatâ€™s New:**
- ğŸ› Fixed the *double response bug* (e.g. `{prefix}help` used to reply twice)  
- ğŸ§¼ Squashed tons of command errors  
- ğŸ—ƒï¸ Switched to a brand-new database â†’ All old data wiped  
- âš™ï¸ New **default prefix** â†’ `**.**` â `**,**`  
- ğŸ¶ Introduced the all-new **Playlist System**

ğŸ’¡ **Playlist ID** is auto-generated when you create one (like `abc123`, `3dfbkm`)

ğŸ§ **Playlist Commands (use `{prefix}`):**
- `create-playlist <name>` â€“ make a playlist  
- `add-to-playlist <playlist_id> <song name/url>`  
- `delete-playlist <playlist_id>`  
- `edit-playlist <playlist_id> name|description <value>`  
- `import-playlist <playlist id or yt/spotify URL>`  
- `playlists` â€“ view all your playlists  
- `pplay <playlist_id>` â€“ play your playlist  
- `remove-song <playlist_id> <index>` â€“ remove a track  
- `playlist-songs <playlist_id>` â€“ view playlist songs

âš ï¸ Currently using a temporary **third-party music node**, so you *might* notice a tiny delay or quality drop. A high-performance node is coming soon!

ğŸŒ Visit the new [website](https://jarvibeta.xyz) and let us know your feedback!

footer.text: You're receiving this update because you're the owner of "${guild.name}"
